> OOC: Airly.. I will accept that absorbing thing however as for 
using

> suddenly "appeared" there I would be very suspicious of it. Also 
note 
> that energy from sparks doesnt act like normal energy. Since 
> Blacknightmare isnt a creation of the Bamphomet and the energy is 
> specifically created to be used solely by those he creates it would 
> have a very bad negative effect on blacknightmare if she absorbed 
it 
> and/or tried to use it to improve anything. I will not reply until 
> you have replied to this. 
>
